data.title: Belgian Stocks: KBC Group, Dexia, Nyrstar, Suez, Umicore Move
data.meta_description: Belgium's Bel20 Index plunged 127.66, or 5.7 percent, to 2,113.22 at 11:38 a.m. in Brussels, the fifth straight loss this week. The benchmark is heading for the biggest five-day plunge on record.
data.text:
Belgium's Bel20 Index plunged 127.66, or 5.7 percent, to 2,113.22 at 11:38 a.m. in Brussels, the fifth straight loss this week. The benchmark is heading for the biggest five-day plunge on record.

The following are among the most active stocks in the Belgian market today. Stock symbols are in parentheses.
